channel.title: Are thees servers legall?
channel.description:
I just wondered. To sell items in server is leggal or not? Or can we sell stuff like membership in our servers? Can we get problems with jagex or sth. by hosting a server? I don't wana get problems with that so i'm asking for help of you if you know something about that please leave your post here :)
I think all of us shud know about it, if there is risk to get a fine or sth. Sorry if my English language is poor. If you don't understad what i'm asking about leave post i will try to explain it.

item.title: Are thees servers legall?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“1336.9, post:27, topic:306611”]Never sell membership or items or staff positions and you will be fine. ;)[/quote] But in general if sum1 wants to donate they can. If they donate you can give them a present. Etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Are thees servers legall?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Servers are legal.
Clients aren’t.
But RuneScape Private Servers aren’t worth the time. I’ve spent 200+ hours working on servers and it got me no where. The chances are you’ll get up to maybe 40 - 50 people at the most but that’s as good as it gets bud. I’d say don’t deal with the troubles of RuneScape Private Servers you’ll have to deal with.

Read full topic

item.title: Are thees servers legall?
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

Portugal, anywhere that is not the United States, Canada, Britain, mainly.

I’ve never had a problem with a Portugal-hosted server with illegal activities.

Also, when I say “off-shore”, I’m referring to off-shore from the United States, Canada, Britan, pretty much.

Read full topic

item.title: Are thees servers legall?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

warlok:

If you sincerely need donations, use an offshore host (Portugal, ect.) when hosting the site/client. Most off-shore hosts allow illegal activity, therefore, you wouldn’t need to worry.

Your off-shore needs to be a little more, off-shore?

Read full topic

item.title: Are thees servers legall?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:13, topic:306611"][quote author=King Lingerz link=topic=402752.msg2983897#msg2983897 date=1254836921]
I’m pretty sure they can shut you down even for accepting donations.
[/quote]
False.
Guy1: “Hey dude, I’m dying of thirst, Can I borrow a dollar?”
Guy2: “Sure!”
Andrew Gower: “WAIT JUST ONE MINUTE. Sorry, that’s a lawsuit. I’ll be seeing you in court.”

That’s fucking retarded and completely untrue.[/quote]But you got the money with aid from hosting a server. They would have never donated if that was actually happening. There’s the fact that, pertaining to what’s hosted on the site, you will be charged if you obtained the money because of what they’ve copyrighted.

Read full topic

item.title: Are thees servers legall?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:16, topic:306611”]Selling anything in relation to running a private server is never a good idea. If they can prove you received money by running the private server, they can take it from you.[/quote] Donating the money you got to the poor is illegal then? :o

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Poridge:

are you fucking serious about donations? they can send you them because there “DONATIONS” AKA GIFTS. It’s there choice.

DONATIONS towards HOSTING a server which they then spend on THEMSELVES… Take some guy on r-s, he got $2,000 off donations, it doesn’t fucking cost two grand to host a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Are thees servers legall?
item.dc:creator: @shadow43 shadow43
item.description:
@shadow43 wrote:

My website host has moved to another ant there i have to write my personal auth code or something and i have to write my real name and last name maybe i shud move to another website host or they just give my a warning for selling items or i had to pay a fine? Is it big risk or not?

Read full topic

item.title: Are thees servers legall?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

HOSTING A SERVER IS NOT ILLEGAL.

However… the clients you use to connect to the server are. You will only ever get noticed by Jagex if you are making a substantial amount of money from the server, and even when that happens they will not take much action except make you shut the site down.

Read full topic

item.title: Are thees servers legall?

I’m pretty sure they can shut you down even for accepting donations.[/quote] are you fucking serious about donations? they can send you them because there “DONATIONS” AKA GIFTS. It’s there choice.
